${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:SleepNextTurn.NAME: Sleep Dart
DESCRIPTIONS: The number shows in how many turns the monster will be slept for a turn.

${modID}:Burn.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of its turn, this creature takes #b damage and then loses half of the stacks.

${modID}:SpringrazorEffect.NAME: Springrazor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal #b damage four times to ALL enemies.
